entries.title: Amazon Q Developer
entries.description: AI-powered coding assistant from AWS. Provides real-time code suggestions, AWS architecture guidance, security scanning, and autonomous code agents. Available as IDE extensions and CLI tool with Free and Pro tiers.

entries.title: AWS Bedrock
entries.description: Managed service providing access to foundation models from leading AI companies including Anthropic Claude, Meta Llama, and Amazon Titan. Offers model customization, guardrails, and knowledge bases with enterprise-grade security and compliance.

entries.title: Azure AI Foundry
entries.description: Microsoft's managed platform for designing, building and running generative AI applications. Combines model catalog, multi-agent orchestration, managed compute and governance capabilities with private networking and enterprise security.

entries.title: ChatGPT
entries.description: OpenAI's conversational AI chatbot built on large language models (GPT-3.5, GPT-4). Helps with writing, coding, brainstorming, and analysis. Available in Free, Plus, Team, and Enterprise tiers with varying security and compliance features.

entries.title: Claude
entries.description: Anthropic's AI chat assistant for writing, analysis, and coding tasks. Offers strong privacy controls with no training on user data by default. Available in Free, Pro, Team, and Enterprise tiers with advanced security certifications including ISO 27001 and FedRAMP High.

entries.title: Claude Code
entries.description: Anthropic's AI coding assistant that runs in terminal/VS Code. Reads and understands large codebases, writes and fixes code, runs tests, and creates pull requests. Keeps full codebase local, only sends specific code snippets for analysis.

entries.title: Cursor
entries.description: AI-enhanced code editor with intelligent code suggestions and refactoring assistance. Offers multiple privacy modes including Legacy mode with zero data retention. Features include Background Agents, Memories, and codebase indexing with SOC 2 Type II certification.

entries.title: GitHub Copilot
entries.description: Microsoft's AI-powered coding assistant integrated with GitHub and popular code editors. Provides code suggestions, public code filtering, and content exclusions. Business tier offers enterprise privacy controls with no data retention for model training.

entries.title: Google Gemini
entries.description: Google's AI chat assistant for content creation, analysis, and productivity tasks. Integrates with Google Workspace including Gmail and Drive. Enterprise version offers enhanced security and privacy controls with strong compliance certifications including ISO 42001 for AI management.

entries.title: Google NotebookLM
entries.description: Google's AI-powered note-taking and research tool for organizing, querying, and summarizing source documents. Answers questions using only attached sources with citations. Available in personal and Google Workspace enterprise versions with enhanced security controls.

entries.title: Windsurf
entries.description: AI-powered IDE with unlimited autocomplete, in-editor chat, and autonomous Cascade AI agent. Offers multiple deployment options including EU cluster, FedRAMP High environment, hybrid, and self-hosted deployments. Features zero-data retention mode and SOC 2 Type II certification.
